attributes.action: Continue to allow ISAs to be tax free from HMRC
attributes.additional_details: ISAs are the most inclusive and innovative system within the UK at the moment, with its ability to help every people save and invest money. Subjecting this to tax will significantly reduce the savings of current generations who are already struggling, as well as a cascading effect for future generations.
attributes.background: Do not allow HMRC to tax ISAs (Cash, Stocks and Shares, Lifetime, Junior and Innovative)

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

The Government has not announced any plans to change tax arrangements for ISAs, so we're not sure exactly what you'd like the Government or Parliament to do.
